This model has been around since the 19th century and has regained its popularity in recent years. 

The term Granny Bike stems from the old fashioned image of the bicycle. 

There are many different types of Dutch Bicycles available (with a classic coaster brake, with a hand brake, with or without gears, in various colors)

bent upwards). 

This model has been around since the 19th century and has regained
its popularity in recent years. 

The term Granny Bike stems from the old
fashioned image of the bicycle. 

There are many different types of Dutch
Bicycles available (with a classic coaster brake, with a hand brake, with or
without gears, in various colors)
